ca.cwfgm.psaas.api.globals

Class Timezone

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cwfgm.psaas.api.globals.Timezone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IValidable

    public abstract class Timezone
extends Object
implements IValidable
    Timezone details to be used in other PSaaS API components.

      • getTimezoneNameList

        public abstract List<TimezoneName> getTimezoneNameList()
        Gets a list of possible time zones from the builder.

        A list of possible time zones.

      • isDST

        public boolean isDST()
        Is the timezone currently in daylight savings time.

      • setDST

        public void setDST(boolean DST)
        Is the timezone currently in daylight savings time.

      • getOffset

        public Duration getOffset()
        The offset from GMT.

      • setOffset

        public void setOffset(Duration offset)
        The offset from GMT.

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Optional value of the timezone. If set to a valid value, the offset will be looked up once the job is submitted so getOffset() and isDST() will be ignored. Valid values can be obtained by calling getTimezoneNameList().

      • setValue

        public void setValue(int value)
        Optional value of the timezone. If set to a valid value, the offset will be looked up once the job is submitted so getOffset() and isDST() will be ignored. Valid values can be obtained by calling getTimezoneNameList().
